room_title: Escape room "The Secret Training Facility" by Xtreme Xcapes in Charlotte
room_address: 246 North New Hope Road Gastonia NC 28054
room_description: There have been rumors for years about a secret government training facility in the local school. You are here to learn the truth behind the rumors. Your investigative team will have 60 minutes to find the evidence that will lead to the truth before you are discovered.
